# ic-theme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                    | Type                                                    | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The theme colour. Can be a hex value e.g. "#ff0000", RGB e.g. "rgb(255, 0, 0)", or RGBA e.g. "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)".                                             | ``#${string}` \| `rgb(${string})` \| `rgba(${string})`` | `null`     |
| `mode`   | `mode`    | The theme mode. Can be "dark", "light", or "system". "system" will use the device or browser settings. Defaults to "system".                                   | `"dark" \| "light" \| "system"`                         | `"system"` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Specifies a custom theme to apply on top of the `mode` prop. the theme name is applied a className to the host element, so that custom styles can be applied." | `string`                                                | `""`       |


----------------------------------------------
